examples/account_opening_form.png.question:
From the document image, please extract the following:
- Account number (enclose in <acct-number>...</acct-number>)
- Person name
  - Don't include title (only first name, middle name and last name)
  - Title case
  - Enclose in <person-name>...</person-name>
- Account type 
  - Exact wording as shown in image
  - Enclose in <acct-type>...</acct-type>
- PAN ID (enclose in <pan-id>...</pan-id>)

examples/annual_return.png.question:
From the document image, please extract the following:
- Name of plan (enclose in <plan-name>...</plan-name>)
- Plan effective date
  - YYYY-mm-dd
  - enclose in <effective-date>...</effective-date>

extracted.llm_response:
- Name of plan: <plan-name>Annual Return Plan</plan-name>
- Plan effective date: <effective-date>2022-02-15</effective-date>

- Name of plan: <plan-name>Annual Return Plan</plan-name>
- Plan effective date: <effective-date>2022-02-15</effective-date>

examples/declaration_of_intent.png.question:
From the document image, please extract the following:
- Full name of candidate (enclosed in <name-of-candidate>...</name-of-candidate>)
- Email address of campaign committee chairperson (enclose in <chairperson-email>...</chairperson-email>)
- Full name of treasurer (enclose in <treasurer-name>...</treasurer-name>)
- Date document received
  - YYYY-mm-dd
  - enclose in <date-received>...</date-received>

examples/domestic_expenditure.png.question:
From the image shown, please extract the following:
- Spending % on medical
  - In format "xx%" e.g. "03%", "98%"
  - enclose in <medical-percent>...</medical-percent>
- Largest expenditure category
  - return category label exactly as in the image
  - write category on a single line (no newlines) with single spaces between words
  - enclose in <largest-spend-category>...</largest-spend-category>
- Proportion of spend to property rental
  - In format "xx%" e.g. "03%", "98%"
  - enclose in <rent>...</rent>

extracted.expected: Expenditure on education and miscelllanious Expenditure
extracted.llm_value: Expenditure on education and miscellaneous Expenditure

examples/health_intake_form.png.question:
From the document image, please extract the following:
- Patient date of birth
  - in format YYYY-mm-dd
  - enclose in <patient-dob>...</patient-dob>
- Patient email address
  - enclose in <email>...</email>
- Patient job title
  - enclose in <job>...</job>

examples/nestle_financial_statements_202.question:
From the document image, please extract the following:
- Profit for the year 2024
  - Express in CHF (not ,000 or mill)
  - Return only an integer (no commas, spaces etc.)
  - Enclose in <profit-2024>...</profit-2024>
- Profit for the year 2023 (same formatting requirements as profit 2024 above)
